name: Kingdom of Pirates
description:
“Captain! Merchantman spotted! Let’s plunder!”
▲ Ready for the pirate-themed strategy-SLG? Train your pirate army and a miraculous journey of conquer starts here!
▲ Commence on an immersive sea-going adventure, delve into the mystic ocean, seize to the fortified outposts, and discovery unknown islands. Complete new levels of challenges and become the sensation of this ocean.
▲ Meet all types of beauties on the way and interact with them intimately! What are you waiting for? Come and collect your harem of beauties and be the most debonair Pirate King!
▲ Our thrilling inheritance formation feature allows you to train an estate of strong descendants! Pick a worthy successor to keep your lineage immortal!
▲ Fun PvP modes, exciting joint raids, and thoughtful crew recruitment helps you to upgrade your pirate force! Find allies and embark on quests together!
▲Download the game and enter into the Kingdom of Pirates with millions of players.
Contact us: kingdomofpiratesservice@gmail.com
**** Features ****
● Exquisite scenes revivifications bring you back to the real 15th Century seafaring adventures! The ultimate sea battle, at the touch of your finger.
● A Strategy EDU-Simulation game where you train your pirate fleet and upgrade the flagship to defend your empire! Keep your supremacy enduring and stay prosperous!
● You will trigger a series of random events while managing outposts. Make a plan of action and construct the fleet of power that even a kraken may fear.
● You will meet all types of beauties and collect them to expand your harem, while our thrilling inheritance formation feature allows you to raise a strong estate of descendants to keep your lineage immortal!
● Choose a birth force for your inheritors, and remember to recruit fellow Pirates and level them up to raise your influence.
**** Three Forces ****
▲ Caribbean: The overlord of the Bahamas route with Bartholomew Roberts as the leader of the force. Collapsed and disordered legal systems are its distinctive characteristics.
▲ Europa: The overlord of the Atlantic Sea route with Francis Drake as the leader of the force. Expeditious iterations and transitions are its distinctive characteristics.
▲ Mediterranean: The overlord of the pan-Mediterranean Sea route with Barbarossa as the leader of the force. The ability to revive and overcoming hardships is its distinctive characteristics.
